social_work: Volunteered for a NGO, Paws Hunger. a youth-driven organization actively looking for volunteers to feed a stray animal in their own neighbourhood for a minimum period of one month.

projects.name: Movie Recommendation System
projects.description:
-Crafted a content-based movie recommendation website using Pandas, Streamlit, and ML.
-Integrated ML algorithms to analyze user preferences for personalized suggestions.
-Curated diverse movie selections for an enjoyable browsing experience.

projects.name: Face Recognition Student Attendance System
projects.description:
-Created a face recognition app using Python.
-Used Tkinter for the GUI, OpenCV for face detection and recognition, and MySQL for database tasks.
-Utilized technologies to ensure a smooth user experience and streamline database management.

projects.name: Heart Disease Predictor
projects.description:
-Developed a heart disease prediction app using various machine learning models.
-Enabled user input for real-time risk assessment and comparison across classifiers.
-Displayed performance metrics and ROC curves for model evaluation.

projects.name: Text Summarizer
projects.description:
-Made a text summarization tool using spaCy, Flask, and the T5 model.
-Implemented machine learning and data science techniques for precise extractive and abstractive summarization.

experiences.description:
-Employed Python (Plotly, Matplotlib, Pandas), to create dashboards, that aided Data Visualization.
-Modified existing reports, ensuring data accuracy and clarity.
-Conceptualized and implemented new features for data reports, enhancing usability and insights.
